title: Rich and creamy mushroom soup
ingredients: ['60g unsalted butter', '2 pounds sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 pinch salt', '1 sweet onion, diced', '1 1/2 tablespoons plain flour', '6 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '950ml chicken stock', '240ml water', '240ml whipping cream', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves for garnish, or to taste']
